dinosaurs 0.0.0.9000

dinosaurs ðŸ¦–ðŸ¦•

The goal of dinosaurs is to provide a dataset on dinosaur species.

The package is currently a work in progress. We are working on collecting more data at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Du5yUoZfhB4fKtmkrHUZq9dmYMgM5-Gda99fi3-A9eI.

Installation

You can install the development version of dinosaurs from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mine-cetinkaya-rundel/dinosaurs")

Example

This is a basic example showing the package usage:

library(dinosaurs)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(dinosaurs, aes(x = vore, fill = vore)) +
geom_bar(show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(
    title = "What dinosaurs eat ðŸ¦–",
    x = "Vore",
    y = "Count"
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("firebrick1", "forestgreen")) +
  theme_minimal()
